mapper.select: select dep_id, dep_money, dep_date, dep_payment, dep_paytype, dep_remarks, o.om_id, o.tom_name, o.tom_card, o.tom_number, u.uid, u.uname from deposit d inner join oldman o on d.om_id = o.om_id inner join user u on d.uid = u.uid order by dep_date desc

select dep_id, dep_money, dep_date, dep_payment, dep_paytype, dep_remarks, o.om_id, o.tom_name, o.tom_card, o.tom_number, u.uid, u.uname from deposit d inner join oldman o on d.om_id = o.om_id inner join user u on d.uid = u.uid where d.om_id = #{omid} order by dep_date desc
mapper.update: update deposit set dep_money=#{depMoney},dep_date=#{depDate},dep_payment=#{depPayment},dep_paytype=#{depPaytype}, dep_remarks=#{depRemarks} where om_id = #{omid}
